Klasse TreatmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.TreatmentController
public class TreatmentController extends Object
The controller class for the treatment window.

    • initializeController

      public void initializeController(AllTreatmentController controller, Stage stage, Treatment treatment, Login user)
      Initializes the controller with the specified parameters.
      Parameter:
      controller - The AllTreatmentController instance.
      stage - The JavaFX stage.
      treatment - The treatment associated with the window.
      user - The logged-in user.
